name: Under Pressure (itch) (Vesperosa, Hedgy, DrunKitten)
description:
This game explores concepts of emotional abuse, appeasement of others, and manipulation. It follows the story of a nameless protagonist navigating their romantic relationship with their partner and aims to invoke an emotional response from the player. Set board an aquatic research vessel, the player must complete several tasks given to them by their partner at the beginning of the day. At the end of the day they will report back to their partner and find that what they had done simply wouldn't suffice, and that they will need to go back the next day and revise what they had done. In the end, you will be faced with a difficult choice. 

Controls:

W - Move North

A - Move West

S - Move South

D - Move East

Space - Interact
